LanguageData.NuclearWasteland.label: nuclear wasteland
LanguageData.NuclearWasteland.description: A land scorched by ancient fire, poisoned by radiation, and shrouded in a perpetual, sickly haze. The soil is dead, the water is toxic, and life has twisted into horrific forms. Survival here is a constant battle against decay, mutation, and the lingering hatred of the old world.
